group_1.textLeft: Mm...! It feels amaaazing out here!
I'm SUPER stoked we get to goof off@on a private beach!

group_1.textRight: I'm glad we were introduced to Touka's papa.
Miyu will have an easier time playing when@it's just the group of us, too.
It's been ages since I've been to the beach!

group_1.textLeft: Same here...

group_1.textRight: Urgh...@[wait:0.8][chara:305401:lipSynch_1]Too hot... I'm dying...

group_1.textLeft: Are you going to be alright?
You'd be less warm if you took your clothes off@and put your swimsuit on instead.

group_1.textRight: Oh, ahaha...@That's true, lol.
But I'm still way too embarrassed to wear@something like that, so...
I'm gonna go find a cool spot and kick back...

group_1.textLeft: ...[chara:102850:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102850:motion_200][chara:102850:lipSynch_1]By the way, where's Miyurin?

group_1.textRight: I haven't seen her since we changed into@our swimsuits.
What if she got too excited over seeing our legs@and collapsed somewhere?!
Then we better start looking for her...

group_1.textLeft: Hm...?@She just sent me a text!

group_1.narration: I want you guys to have fun in peace,@so I'm gonna watch from a distance!

group_1.textRight: ...Wait, is she not going to join us?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, now it's search party time!
With all of us on the lookout,@finding her is gonna be a cinch!

group_1.textCenter: Um, uh! Please leave me alone!

group_1.textLeft: We really did track her down fast, huh...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I strictly forbade you from going off on your own.@You know that, right?

group_1.textLeft: I know, b-but!
Being surrounded by bare legs makes me feel@like I'm gonna faint...
But! But I found out that if I'm watching through@a camera, I can concentrate on filming...
Which keeps me from blacking out when@I get worked up!
So I was thinking I'd stay over here and play@photographer for everybody instead...

group_1.textRight: That's, like, totally pointless.
This cutie wants to play with ALL of you,@Miyurin included.

group_1.textLeft: I wanted to do that too, but...

group_1.textRight: It's alright, Miyu.@We each brought something to help.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?@What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Isn't it obvious?
We've got skirts and pants we can wear over@our swimsuits.
Covering our legs up will make it easier for you@to play with us, won't it?

group_1.textLeft: ...[chara:103250:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103250:cheek_1][chara:103250:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:103250:eyeClose_1][chara:103250:tear_1][chara:103250:lipSynch_1]Lady Saaan...
Everyone else, too...@Thank you sooo much!
Sounds like we're gucci!

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I want us to be able to enjoy@this together, you know?

group_1.textLeft: Well, with that problem solved,@let's make haste back to the beach.
This is hardly the place to stop@and smell the roses.
Of course, Lady San!

group_1.textCenter: E-excuse me! I have something I wanna give@to everybody!

group_1.textRight: What are these books?

group_1.textLeft: I put together some photo albums to thank you@all for your help at the beach the other day!

group_1.textRight: Oh...? How sweet of you.

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp* Wow...!@I can't believe Lady San praised me...

group_1.textRight: An album, huh?@I'm a little embarrassed...

group_1.textLeft: Even just one copy...would've been plenty...

group_1.textRight: Lol thanks, Miyu.

group_1.textLeft: You're welcome!
...I've always shied away from going@to the beach or pool.
But if I'd known I could've been having so much@fun with just a little workaround,
I would've wanted to go even sooner!

group_1.textRight: Goodness... Someone is certainly excitable.
*Giggle* I'd love for us to go back to play@again sometime, wouldn't you?♪

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, so, Miyurin...@What's up with the last page here?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, those are my choice leg shots!
I felt bad keeping them to myself,@so I figured I'd put them in!

group_1.textRight: Uh, I appreciate the thought, but...
I wouldn't have minded if you hogged these.@[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]I kinda...don't need 'em!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?!

group_1.textRight: I'd prefer it if you just wiped the image data@right now...

group_1.textLeft: Whaaat?!

group_1.textRight: That enthusiast feel when your hype is lost on@other people...lol.
Now delete those photos at once.

group_1.textLeft: I'm begging! I'm begging you!
I won't show them to anyone else, so pweeease@wet me keep them for mysewf...
